name: InputMask
description: InputMask component is used to enter input in a certain format such as numeric, date, currency, email and phone.

slot-char.label: slotChar
slot-char.title: Placeholder character in mask, default is underscore.

auto-clear.label: autoClear
auto-clear.title: Clears the incomplete value on blur.

unmask.label: unmask
unmask.title: Defines if model sets the raw unmasked value to bound value or the formatted mask value.

invalid.label: invalid
invalid.title: When present, it specifies that the component should have invalid state style.

variant.label: variant
variant.title: Specifies the input variant of the component.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.
